plugins.name: prototype-mode
plugins.description: Safe prototyping environment that focuses exclusively on frontend UI/UX development with mock data, blocking backend operations and external integrations

plugins.name: feature-harness
plugins.description: Autonomous feature implementation system with multi-session context management. Design features with spec-writer, implement with autonomous agents, track with Linear integration.

plugins.name: feature-harness-mvp
plugins.description: MVP prototype to validate Feature Harness pure plugin approach - tests MCP access, artifact context, and autonomy
